Hello.message:
We are for Clean Internet WITHOUT ADVERTISING.
@twitris_bot - Free bot, no need to subscribe to Channels/Chats.

Text.download: Choose what you want to download from the menu.
Text.convert: Choose what you want to convert from the menu.
Text.video: Choose what you want to do with the video from the menu.
Text.message: Select from the menu what you want to do.

Long.restrictions:
Send a video link.
The video should not exceed 15 minutes.
Long.duration: The video should not exceed 7 minutes.

Audio.restrictions:
Send a video link.
The video should not exceed 50 MB.

VideoNote.restrictions:
Send a video.
The video should not exceed 1 minute.
VideoNote.duration: The video should not exceed 1 minute.
VideoNote.invalidFileType: The video should be in mp4 format.

Chat.needDonate: To access the chat, you need to make a purchase or donate!

Buy.message: After payment, we will send you the file.

Donate.restrictions:
Choose the Donation Amount in TON
Each Donation will be distributed among the @TWITRIS Chat Participants. Join us.

NewsLetter.message: Select from the menu what you want to do.

ParsingUsers.restrictions: Send a link to the chat.

Parsing.message: Choose what needs to be parsed from the menu.

Price.set: Write a new program price in USD.

Convert.message: Choose what you want to convert from the menu.

Loading.loading: Wait for the previous video to finish installing.
